newsitem.title: REPUBLIC OF IRELAND: CBT appoints James Buckley as president and CEO.
newsitem.headline: CBT appoints James Buckley as president and CEO.

text.p: Dublin-based software company, CBT Group, said on Monday that it had appointed James Buckley as president and chief operating officer of the group, with effect from September 3.

"We are very pleased that Jim (Buckley) has agreed to join CBT. He has a wealth of experience running a large complex business, which will be of enormous help to us as we move into the next stage of our development," CBT chairman William McCabe said in a statement.
Buckley was formerly president of Apple Americas and senior vice president of Apple Computer Inc, CBT said.
CBT provides interactive education software designed for technology education and training.
